templates.title: Plausible
templates.note: Deploys plausible analytics service, along with the database and supporting services

env.name: ADMIN_USER_EMAIL
env.label: Administrator email
env.description: The email you'll use to login as admin to plausible.

env.name: ADMIN_USER_NAME
env.label: Administrator username
env.description: The username you'll use to login as admin to plausible.

env.name: ADMIN_USER_PWD
env.label: Administrator password
env.description: The password you'll use to login as admin to plausible.

env.name: BASE_URL
env.label: Analytics URL
env.description: the URL for analytics - eg analytics.yourdomain.com

env.name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
env.label: Random secret key base
env.description: A key that will be used to encrypt sessions. Use a random string

env.name: POSTGRES_DATABASE_NAME
env.label: Database name (postgres)
env.description: The database name in postgres database where to store the main data.
